titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of July 15, 2024, as "National Leiomyosarcoma Awareness Day".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of July 15, 2024, as "National Leiomyosarcoma Awareness Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of July 15, 2024, as National Leiomyosarcoma Awareness Day.
